paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: All patients enrolled in this study were symptomatic, except for an LQT2 patient harboring potassium voltage-gated channel subfamily H member 2 (KCNH2) p.G601S.

functional_data.summary: Functional assays indicated that the response to IKr blockade was significantly smaller in KCNH2 variant carriers.

variants.additional_notes: The patient with the KCNH2 variant was asymptomatic, indicating potential incomplete penetrance.
key_quotes: All patients enrolled in this study were symptomatic, except for an LQT2 patient harboring potassium voltage-gated channel subfamily H member 2 (KCNH2) p.G601S.

functional_data.summary: Functional assays indicated that the response to IKr blockade was significantly smaller in KCNH2 variant carriers.

variants.additional_notes: The patient with the KCNH2 variant experienced syncope, indicating full penetrance.

tables_processed.table_caption: Information on Patients Enrolled in the Present Study

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 variants were successfully extracted.
